fields.name: Dutiful (Passive):
fields.value:
Immune to ~~occupy~~ *roleblock* and redirect.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: Serve Wine (Night):
fields.value: ~~Occupy~~ Roleblock a player tonight with wine. They will not be able to use abilities tonight.

fields.name: Concentrated Wine (Night, 2 Uses):
fields.value: Throw a party, occupying everyone that targets you with an ability.
